snippet.title: DOOMBLADE - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
DOOMBLADE is here to SLICE AND DICE with its announcement trailer! Deep underground, Gloom Girl discovers DOOMBLADE, a sentient weapon hellbent on escape after eons in chains. Together, “Doom and Gloom” embark on a brutal quest to unlock the powers of The Void and destroy the Dread Lords once and for all in this 2D Action Metroidvania.

Wishlist now on Steam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/922050/DOOMBLADE/

Stay up to date with DOOMBLADE and Iceberg Interactive: 

Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/DOOMBLADEgame/
https://www.facebook.com/iceberginteractive

Twitter:
https://twitter.com/DOOMBLADEgame
http://twitter.com/Iceberg_Int

Discord: http://discord.gg/iceberginteractive
Official website: https://www.doomblade.com/
Steam publisher page: http://bit.ly/IcebergOnSteam

#DOOMBLADE #Metroidvania #Metroidvaniagame
